homeText.About us: Since 1998, we have been a leading company in the Refrigeration Industry. We have a modern industrial plant dedicated to the processing and slaughter of meats from animals raised in the Argentine Patagonia. Equipped with the latest technology, we position ourselves as a reliable provider of meat products.
